ModMetaData.name: Knot Root (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Arbees mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1511707471
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/KnotRoot
--- Original Description --- Adds a crop that only grows in darkness, which can be harvested for wood. Perfect for cave dwelling tribal colony.
